cwd.description: The directory containing the firebase.json file for your project

readyWhen.description: A string value to watch the console for. This allows the process to wait for the emulator servers to be started before proceeding with the script.
readyWhen.default: It is now safe to connect

parallel.description: A value of "true" will allow nested commands. (nx e2e <projectName> => nx run <projectName>:firebase-emulators)

only.description: If provided, will only start the specified emulators. If this command was setup by the plugin, the plugin will start only the emulators specified in your firebase.json file.

disableOnly.description: Disables the usage of --only. If true, the hosting emulator will be started and any other emulators that firebase deems necessary
